skills.name: Acorn Toss
skills.description: Throws a hard acorn at the target.

skills.name: Heal Light
skills.description: Restores a small amount of HP to one ally.

skills.name: Spark
skills.description: A tiny bolt of magical energy.

skills.name: Encourage
skills.description: Boosts an ally's attack for the battle.

skills.name: Mud Splash
skills.description: Flings sticky mud that slows the target.

skills.name: Quick Attack
skills.description: A swift strike that hits before the enemy can react.

skills.name: Power Strike
skills.description: A heavy blow that deals massive damage.

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Brings a fallen ally back to life with some HP.

skills.name: Poison Sting
skills.description: A venomous strike that poisons the target.

skills.name: Lullaby
skills.description: Sings a soothing melody that puts enemies to sleep.

skills.name: Stun Shock
skills.description: A jolt of electricity that may stun the target.

skills.name: Pounce
skills.description: Maddie leaps at the enemy with surprising force.

skills.name: Purr Heal
skills.description: Maddie's soothing purr heals the party a little.

skills.name: Distract
skills.description: Maddie distracts enemies, lowering their accuracy.

skills.name: Root Slam
skills.description: Massive roots erupt from the ground, hitting all enemies.

skills.name: Roll Attack
skills.description: The acorn tucks in and rolls into the target with surprising force.

skills.name: Poison Bite
skills.description: A venomous bite that may poison the target, dealing damage over time.
